## About Me

###Hi! My name is Renu Karthikeyan. I am from Dallas, Texas, and live in the Denver Area. 

###I am passionate about Carnatic Music, Indian Classical Dance, and finance. I got my Bachelors degree in Finance with a focus on corporate finance from the University of Texas at Dallas (UTD). I currently work for Comcast in Denver.
